resources.string: Select any one of the 2 APIs available
Enter your 10 digit phone number. We are using SMS Retriever API to fetch your passcode.
Enter the received One Time Passcode here. We are using SMS Retriever API to fetch your passcode.
Enter your 10 digit phone number. We are using SMS user consent API to fetch your passcode.
Enter the received One Time Passcode here. We are using SMS user consent API to fetch your passcode.
